data.name: module_basics
data.marketing: For SRPs, allows you to set the basic information about your rental.
data.description: Allows property managers of SRPs to set the basic information about their rental. For example, the number of bedrooms, bathrooms, maximum occupancy, size of the property in square meters. This information can then be used as a shortcode to display information about the property.
data.change_log: v1.1 Do not do anything if module basics not yet configured. v1.2 Select list markup changes.
data.author: Vince Wooll
